Acer Veriton S2680G Core I5 11th Gen 8GB Ram 1TB HDD Brand PC

The Acer Veriton S2680G Brand PC is powered by an 11TH GEN. INTEL CORE 15-11400 2.60GHz TO 4.40GHz processor (12MB). It comes with 8GB of DDR4 RAM. This computer features an ACER V206HQL 19.5-inch monitor and Intel UHD Graphics 730. It has a 1TB hard drive for storage. It has Gigabit Ethernet LAN networking. TPM v2.0 FW Kensington lock slot security on the Acer Veriton S2680G Brand PC. This Brand PC has 1 PCIe x16 slot, 1 PCIe x1 slot, and 1 M. There are two SSD slots. It includes two USB 2.0 ports on the front and two USB 3.2 G 1 1 combo ports on the back. 4 USB Rear Jack 2.0, 3 USB ports 1 VGA, 1 HDMI, 3.2 G1 1 Line-in, 1 Line-out, 1 Microphone Port It features a 250W power supply. It came with a built-in high-definition audio controller. this brand of computer's FREE DOS operating system features a DVD-RW drive. A USB keyboard and mouse are included with the Acer Veriton S2680G Brand PC. It comes with a 03-year warranty.

full_description:
Acer Veriton M4690G Core i7 12th Gen Tower Brand PC

The Acer Veriton M4690G Core i7 12th Gen Tower Brand PC is a powerful and reliable desktop computer designed to meet the demands of both work and entertainment. With its robust hardware specifications and thoughtful accessories, it's a versatile choice for various computing needs. The Intel Core i7-12700 Processor, boasts a substantial 25MB Cache and a base clock speed of 2.1GHz, which can turbo boost up to an impressive 4.9GHz. This processing power ensures that tasks, from everyday office work to resource-intensive applications and gaming, run smoothly and efficiently. Equipped with 8GB of RAM, this PC provides ample memory to handle multitasking, allowing you to run multiple applications simultaneously without experiencing slowdowns. With a spacious 1TB 3.5" 7200rpm SATA hard drive, you'll have plenty of storage space for your documents, media files, and software installations. This drive's 7200rpm speed ensures quick data access and smooth system performance. The integrated Intel UHD Graphics 770 offers decent graphics performance for everyday tasks and light gaming. While it may not be a dedicated gaming graphics card, it can handle casual gaming and multimedia tasks with ease. Included in this package is a 19.5" LED monitor by Acer, providing vibrant colors and sharp visuals for an enjoyable computing experience. The monitor's size strikes a balance between screen real estate and desk space efficiency. You'll find an Acer USB keyboard and mouse included, making this PC ready for immediate use. The keyboard and mouse are designed for comfort and productivity, ensuring you can work efficiently right out of the box. The Acer Veriton M4690G Core i7 12th Gen Tower Brand PC offers a powerful computing experience with its high-performance Intel Core i7 processor, generous RAM, and ample storage. Whether you're tackling demanding work tasks or enjoying multimedia entertainment, this PC is up to the challenge. Additionally, the included monitor, keyboard, and mouse enhance the overall value of this package, making it a compelling choice for both professionals and home users.

This means it can handle a wide range of tasks, from everyday office work to more demanding applications with ease. The PC is equipped with an Intel 12th Gen Core i5-12400 processor. You can comfortably run multiple programs simultaneously without experiencing slowdowns. The PC features a speedy 512GB SSD M.2 NVMe storage drive. The package includes a 19.5" Acer LED monitor, offering vibrant visuals and a comfortable screen size for everyday tasks, web browsing, and even entertainment. The Acer Veriton M4690G Tower PC also includes an Acer USB keyboard and mouse, providing you with essential input devices to interact with your computer comfortably. The Acer Veriton M4690G Core i5 12th Gen Tower PC is a versatile and capable machine that can handle various computing needs while offering a reliable and responsive user experience. Its combination of a powerful processor, ample RAM, fast SSD storage, and a decent-sized monitor makes it a practical choice for a wide range of users.
